Membership
Become a Member!
What you experience here, is created here, by us, specifically for our stages. Help us sustain the resident talent that does the professional casting, directing & choreography, costumes, music, sound & lighting, set construction and so much more!
Call
772-231-6990
or email
members@riversidetheatre.com
Members are Vital for the Theatre to Thrive
Be a VIP and play an important role in sustaining the quality work you come here to see.
Every Membership dollar enables the Theatre to deliver the excellence you appreciate and expect.
Please join this elite Annual Program, and help the Theatre continue to:
Keep Ticket Prices Affordable
Produce Broadway-Quality Shows
Host Distinguished
Lecturers
Present Spectacular Special Events
Hold Free
Live in the Loop
Concerts every Weekend
Offer Life-Changing
Children’s Educational Programming
Provide
Tuition Assistance
to Underserved Children
Expand
Community Engagement Programs
Remain a Critical Economic Member of the Community

Learn More
Riverside Theatre is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization
, federal tax id #59-1764305, under the internal revenue service code. A copy of the official registration and financial information may be obtained from the division of consumer services by calling 800-435-7352 toll free within the state, or by visiting www.Floridaconsumerhelp.com. Registration does not imply endorsement, approval or recommendation by the state. 100% of each contribution is received by Riverside Theatre Inc. Registration #CH2618.
Show photo credits
from top to bottom and left to right. Ángel Lozada & Iliana Marie Garcia in On Your Feet! The Story of Emilio Estefan & Gloria Estefan (2023). Cast of
Beehive
(2019). Cast of Jersey Boys (2024). Bailey Purvis in
Beehive The 60’s Musical
(2019). Dan Fenaughty & Jessica Mosher in
The 39 Steps
(2020). Vincent Crocilla, Emily Berman, & Bergman Freedman in
Lost in Yonkers
(2020). Cast of
La Cage aux Folles
(2020). Cast of
My Fair Lady
(2019). Cast of
Thoroughly Modern Millie
(2020). Cast of
A Chorus Line
(2016).

Riverside Theatre in Vero Beach, FL is a non-profit, professional producing theatre featuring musicals and plays on our main stage. Patrons also enjoy 
the Theatre's NIGHTLIFE on Fridays and Saturdays with stand-up comedy, 
dueling pianos on the second stage and free outdoor concerts in front of 
the Theatre.

Mission Statement
Campus Facilities
Our History
Job Openings
Volunteering
Theatrical Rentals
Site Directory
Site Directory
Riverside Theatre Site Directory
Riverside Theatre
is a non-profit, professional theatre affiliated with Actor's Equity Association, The League of Resident Theatres, Stage Directors and Choreographers Society, and United Scenic Artists. Riverside Children's Theatre, the educational arm of Riverside, offers classes, camps, and training opportunities in the areas of theatre, dance, music, and video for all ages on a year round basis.

Contact
CONTACT US, HOURS & DIRECTIONS
Box Office: 772-231-6990 or Buy Tickets online 24/7
You may also email us 24/7:
TicketHelp@RiversideTheatre.com
Summer Season Box Office Hours:
Monday-Wednesday:
9am-3pm
Thursday & Friday:
9am-3pm and 5pm-8:30pm
Saturday:
5pm-8:30pm
And Open 1-hour before all children’s shows!
Winter & Spring Season Box Office Hours:
Monday:
9am-3pm
Tuesday:
9am–4pm (on show day also open 6:30pm-8pm)
Wednesday:
9am–4pm and 6:30pm-8pm
Thursday:
9am–4pm and 5pm-8pm
Friday:
9am–4pm and 5pm-8:15pm
Saturday:
1pm–4pm and 5pm-8:15pm
Sunday:
1-hour prior to showtime
Loop
Concerts &
Comedy Zone Nights Hours:
Thursday 5pm-7pm, Friday & Saturdays the Box Office will reopen in the evenings at 5pm-8pm
Lobby opens:
1-hour prior to showtime. Seating for musicals and plays on the Stark and Waxlax stages open 30-minutes prior to showtime. Please allow enough time to park, pick-up your tickets and be seated.
Administration Office:
(772) 231-5860
Office Hours: Mon-Fri: 9am-5pm
Ticket Sales Policies/Exchanges:
Learn more click here
Parking:
Riverside Theatre has a handicap parking lot adjacent to the southeast side of the Theatre and ample free city parking across from the Theatre in Riverside Park.
Address:
3250 Riverside Park Drive, Vero Beach, FL 32963 -
